name: init

name: hangup
notes: iOS: LinphoneBridge.callHangup (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L85-L87) → LinphoneManager.hangup (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneManager.swift#L84-L90); Android: LinphoneBridge.callHangup (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L96-L99) → LinphoneManager.hangup (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneManager.kt#L91-L95).

name: answer
notes: iOS: LinphoneBridge.callAnswer (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L89-L91) → LinphoneManager.answer (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneManager.swift#L93-L99); Android: LinphoneBridge.callAnswer (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L102-L104) → LinphoneManager.answer (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneManager.kt#L82-L88).

name: sendDtmf
notes: iOS: LinphoneBridge.sendDtmf (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L93-L95) → LinphoneManager.sendDtmf (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneManager.swift#L102-L109); Android: LinphoneBridge.sendDtmf (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L107-L109) → LinphoneManager.sendDtmf (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneManager.kt#L98-L104).

name: sendMessage
notes: iOS: LinphoneBridge.messageSend (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L97-L99) → LinphoneManager.sendMessage (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneManager.swift#L113-L124); Android: LinphoneBridge.messageSend (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L112-L114) → LinphoneManager.sendMessage (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneManager.kt#L107-L115). TODO: replace mock messaging payloads.

name: setAudioRoute
notes: iOS: LinphoneBridge.audioSetRoute (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L101-L112) uses AudioRouter.setRoute (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/AudioRouter.swift#L17-L53) and LinphoneManager.updateAudioRoute (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneManager.swift#L127-L132); Android: LinphoneBridge.audioSetRoute (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L117-L131) uses AudioRouter.applyRoute (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/AudioRouter.kt#L22-L61) and LinphoneManager.updateAudioRoute (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneManager.kt#L119-L123).

name: removeEventListener
notes: UTS cleanup logic: uni_modules/utssdk/utssdk/index.uts#L227-L248; iOS: LinphoneBridge.clearEventCallback (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L69-L71); Android: LinphoneBridge.clearEventCallback/setEventListener(null) (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L67-L79).

name: permission
notes: iOS emission in LinphoneBridge.initialize (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L33-L55); Android emission in LinphoneBridge.initialize with ensureMicrophonePermission (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L33-L56). TODO: Android still lacks runtime permission request (see #L134-L145).

name: registration
signature: Event payload: { state: string, message?: string }
notes: iOS: LinphoneBridge.initialize and LinphoneManager.didUpdateRegistration (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L58-L62 & #L158-L164); Android: LinphoneBridge.initialize and onRegistrationStateChanged (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L58-L63 & #L168-L174).

name: call
notes: iOS: LinphoneManager.didUpdateCall emits call info (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L166-L170); Android: onCallStateChanged mirrors payload (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L176-L180).

name: message
signature: Event payload: { direction: string, to?: string, text?: string, ... }
notes: iOS: LinphoneManager.didReceiveMessage (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L172-L174); Android: onMessage (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L182-L184). TODO: hook into actual Linphone messaging once available.

name: audioRoute
notes: iOS: audioSetRoute and LinphoneManager.didChangeAudioRoute emit updates (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L101-L112 & #L176-L179); Android: audioSetRoute and onAudioRoute emit updates (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L117-L131 & #L186-L188).

name: error
signature: Event payload: { category: string, message: string }
notes: iOS: emitError and LinphoneManager.didFailWith (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/LinphoneBridge.swift#L144-L154 & #L182-L184) plus permission denial handling (#L37-L48); Android: emitError and onError (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/LinphoneBridge.kt#L154-L192).

name: AudioRoutes
notes: Defined in UTS index (uni_modules/utssdk/utssdk/index.uts#L108-L113); iOS AudioRoute enum mirrors strings (uni_modules/utssdk/app-ios/src/AudioRouter.swift#L4-L11); Android AudioRouter.Route enum mirrors strings (uni_modules/utssdk/app-android/src/main/java/com/utssdk/linphone/AudioRouter.kt#L9-L19).
